Detailed Description

Class for models whose bulk is a visual with nodes.

bool NodefullModel::valid (  )  const [virtual]

This function returns true if the NodefullModel is in a valid state.

This function will not raise a critical error or assert if called but may commit ERROR_MSGs to the log.

Returns:
Returns true if the model is in a valid state, otherwise false.

Reimplemented from Model.
